long_description: Offering 11-speed compatibility and excellent value, the Shimano WH-RS21 CL wheelset delivers dependable riding performance, whether you're training, commuting or just out enjoying a ride. Aluminum rims offer resilient performance and versatile use; rim wear indicators allow safe detection of worn rim. Off-center rim shape of rear wheel decreases spoke angle on the cassette side of the wheel, allowing greater spoke tension and increased wheel strength. Freehub body is compatible with Shimano 11-speed cassettes as well as Shimano and SRAM 8-, 9- and 10-speed cassettes. 16/20 bladed, double-butted stainless-steel spokes are laced radially on the front wheel and 2-cross on the rear wheel, offering a balance between light weight and strength. Smooth-spinning hubs use angular contact bearings for lasting use and easy serviceability. Shimano WH-RS21 CL wheelset comes with quick-release skewers and rim tape; 100mm front and 130mm rear axle spacing. Please note: these wheels are compatible with clincher tires and Presta tube valves only.
short_description: Offering 11-speed compatibility and excellent value, the Shimano WH-RS21 CL wheelset delivers dependable riding performance, whether you're training, commuting or just out enjoying a ride.
